name: Terry Butterfly Chromoly Saddle - Women's
description: Terry has years of experience working with competitive and casual female cyclists. They’ve brought it all to the design of the Butterfly.Low profile, flat top has a vinyl cover.Wider in the rear than most race saddles, for good support of a woman's sit bones.Nose and midsection are completely cut away for flexibility and comfort against soft tissues.Multi-density foam is slightly stiffer at the rear for more power while pedaling.Cromoly steel rails.
